contents:
THe Bun’s(必须要加the，突出唯一) full title goes like: 
“Jinping of the House Shit(音同Xi)
the First of His Name, 
President of China , 
The Reader,
King of Liang Jia He, 
the First man of the Shit Carriers , 
Protector of the Shithole, 
The Ph.D (Doctor of Philosophy) in Liang Study,
the Chief Accelerator Officer,
the Wheat Walker,
Father of Shit”.
